stories.text:
Recent Updates: Its new updates like listing of SafeMoon protocol and its collaboration with Dragonbite to increase the platform's liquidity is attracting a lot of newbies. This platform has also recently partnered with MoonPay in order to give access to Advanced fiat-crypto transactions. What is Bitmart? Bitmart is a Cayman Island based cryptocurrency trading platform, created by crypto enthusiasts. It was founded in the year 2017, though it is young with its advanced functionality this platform is already serving over 50,00,000+ users in 140+ countries globally.

Bitmart has a truly significant liquidity, at the time of writing this article, Bitmart’s 24 hr trading volume was USD $1.4 billion.

Bitmart exchange being the most trustworthy trading platform comes with a multi-layer and multi-cluster system to strengthen the security, stability and scalability of the system. As its audience are all over the globe for local convenience this trading platform has been translated into six languages, including russian and english.

Bitmart token: (BMX). Bitmart created its own token BMX based on ERC20 standard, which can be used on this platform to access the new projects listed and get eligible for a discount on the trading or transaction fees charged. By using BMX to pay transaction fees, users can earn 25% discount on trading rates. Also users can make use of various benefits associated with this native token, like they can also be used to earn trading fee dividends through the BitMart Mission X community Listing Market.

The Bitmart Affiliate Program: Bitmart Affiliate Program gives you an opportunity to earn exciting rewards for each successful registration using your referral code. Refer your friends to join the Bitmart community and can get up to 70% commission fees.
